sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Navbar from './Navbar' import { useSearchParams } from 'react-router-dom' import SinglePageProductShimmer from './SinglePageProductShimmer' import Header from './Header' import Footer from './Footer' import UserReviewCard from './UserReviewCard' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { addToCart } from './cartSlice' const SingleProductPage = () => { const dispatch=useDispatch() const items = useSelector((store)=>store.cart.items) const[searchParam] = useSearchParams() const[item,setItem]=useState({}) const[isloading,setIsLoading]=useState(true) const[view,setView]=useState(false) useEffect(()=>{ getSingleProduct() },[]) const getSingleProduct=async()=>{ const data = await fetch(`https://dummyjson.com/products/${searchParam.get("v")}`) const json = await data.json() setItem(json) setIsLoading(false) } if(isloading===true) return return ( <>
  • {item.title}
  • {item.brand}
  • {item.description}
    • ₹{((item.price)*81).toLocaleString()}
    • ₹{(((item.price)*81)/(1-item.discountPercentage/100)).toFixed(0).toLocaleString()}
    • {item.discountPercentage}%off
  • ⭐{(item.rating).toLocaleString()}
  • {item.stock}in stock
  • Bank Offer 10% off on HDFC Bank Credit Card Transactions, up to ₹750. On orders of ₹2,000 and above
  • Bank Offer 5% off on BOB Bank Credit Card Transactions, up to ₹750. On orders of ₹2,000 and above
  • Bank Offer 5% off on SBI Bank Credit Card Transactions, up to ₹750. On orders of ₹2,000 and above
{view ? null: } {view ?<>: null}
) } export default SingleProductPage
